updateAvailable: There is a new version of this script available on GitHub!
errorURLResolve:
An error occurred while resolving the Custom-URL.
Maybe the API-Key was revoked.
errorUpdatingDB: An error occurred while updating the database.
errorAPIRequest: An error occurred while querying the Steam-API.
errorAPIData: The Steam-API response contains invalid data.
errorUserAmount: An error occurred while reading the number of users.
errorReadingUserDB: An error occurred while reading the user list.
profileInvalid: is invalid and was NOT added to the list!
profileAdded: was successfully added to the list!
userStartInfo: You are currently not allowed to use this bot, but you can request access using /request.
userRequestSendMaster: has requested access. How would you like to proceed?
userRequestAccepted:
Your request has been accepted.
You can now add profiles via /add <steamID64>.
userRequestAcceptedMaster: The request has been accepted and permissions have been granted.
userRequestRevoked: Your access has just been revoked!
userRequestRevokedMaster: The user has been removed successfully.
userEmpty: Nobody else is currently using this bot.
menuActionChoose: Choose one of the following actions.
botStatistics: The database contains a total of %TOTAL% profile(s) added by %USERS% user(s). %BANNED% of them are banned and %CHECKED% are still being checked which means a total of %PERCENT%% of all profiles are banned.
userStatistics: You have added %PROFILES% profile(s) and %BANNED% (%PERCENT%%) of them are banned.
